text: @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump do you remember when there were only 15 cases of Coronavirus in the US, you said that “we will be down to zero very shortly”... it was about the same time you said you had Coronavirus contained... nearly 1,000 Americans have died since your lies... increasing https://t.co/7mp6F1TelR

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
